name: Genie Gym
summary: Are you looking for something more than a virtual copy of a traditional game? Want to play something playfully unique? Genie Gym is a reimagining of popular sports games for the virtual world. 3D versions of pool, bocce, and cornhole offer a casual experience, while 3D versions of pong, tennis, handball, and spikeball offer something more fast paced. There is a game for everyone!
